Google w^x policy on Androids 10 and higher

Warning!

  1. Google enforces target API >= 29 (targetSdkVersion) for all application updates at Google Play from November 1 2020.
  2. An application targeted API >= 29 cannot execve() any binaries from any file tree locations that is writable by it on Androids 10 and higher.

Mitigation

Before November 1 2020, Another Term will be split into two flavors:

  • green_green_avk.anotherterm becomes targeting API 29 and still published at Google Play. Another Term Shell Plugin - Android 10 Essentials will be published in order to provide PRoot / minitar / possibly some launcher for binaries for Androids 10 and higher.
  • green_green_avk.anotherterm.oldgood is still targeting API 28 and published at GitHub only.

Note: the next Google Play version will target API 29. Good luck.
